name: Build
description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: npm, package.json)

name: CI
description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts

name: Performance
description: A code change that improves performance

name: Refactor
description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

name: Style
description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons)

name: Test
description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
